metadata.Title: CVE-2016-0825 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: The Widevine Trusted Application in Android 6.0.1 before 2016-03-01 allows attackers to obtain sensitive TrustZone secure-storage information by leveraging kernel access, as demonstrated by obtaining Signature or SignatureOrSystem access, aka internal bug 20860039.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
